definitions.definition: ( sports , uncountable ) A winter sport played on ice, from which ice hockey developed.
( sports , countable ) A club bent at the lower part for striking a ball at play; a hockey stick.

main_definition: ( sports , uncountable ) A winter sport played on ice, from which ice hockey developed.
secondary_definitions: ( sports , countable ) A club bent at the lower part for striking a ball at play; a hockey stick.

definitions.definition: A carriage or cart used in India , especially one drawn by bullocks .

main_definition: A carriage or cart used in India , especially one drawn by bullocks .
